Description: Body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style, pottery chalice with part of handle zone; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior, slip mostly worn; from top: foreleg of sphinx or lion to right; brown band; in handle zone part of guilloche frieze.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0421) (phase 2)
